item.description:
GET

NSString *urlString = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"https://xxxxx.co.jp/test?key1=%@",key1];

    DLog(@"urlString:%@", urlString)

    NSURLSession *urlSession;
    NSURLSessionConfiguration *sessionConfig = [NSURLSessionConfiguration defaultSessionConfiguration];
    sessionConfig.timeoutIntervalForRequest = 5;
    sessionConfig.timeoutIntervalForResource = 20;

    // å‡¦ç†ã‚’å˜ç´”åŒ–ã•ã›ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«delegateã¯ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚
    // UIé–¢é€£ã®å‡¦ç†ã‚’æƒ³å®šã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ãŸã‚ã€delegateQueueã¯ç‹¬è‡ªã«ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
    urlSession = [NSURLSession sessionWithConfiguration:sessionConfig
                                               delegate:nil
                                          delegateQueue:nil];

    NSLog(@"get start");

    NSMutableURLRequest *request = [NSMutableURLRequest new];
    [request setURL:[NSURL URLWithString:urlString]];
    [request setCachePolicy:NSURLRequestReloadIgnoringLocalCacheData];
    [request setValue:@"YKTHttpClient" forHTTPHeaderField:@"User-Agent"];
    [request setHTTPMethod:@"GET"];

    // å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºãŒå°ã•ã„ã®ã§taskã¯NSURLSessionDataTaskã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
    NSURLSessionDataTask *dataTask
            = [urlSession dataTaskWithRequest:request
                            completionHandler:^(NSData *data, NSURLResponse *response, NSError *error) {
                                NSHTTPURLResponse *httpUrlResponse = (NSHTTPURLResponse *) response;
                                DLog(@"Status code: %ld", httpUrlResponse.statusCode);

                                CFStringEncoding encoding = CFStringConvertIANACharSetNameToEncoding((CFStringRef) [response textEncodingName]);
                                NSString *body = [[NSString alloc] initWithData:data encoding:CFStringConvertEncodingToNSStringEncoding(encoding)];
                                NSData *restoreData = [[NSData alloc] initWithBase64EncodedString:body options:0];

                                NSString *restoreString = [[NSString alloc] initWithData:restoreData encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
                                dispatch_async(
                                        dispatch_get_main_queue(),
                                        ^{
                                            self.textView.text = restoreString;
                                        }
                                );
                            }];

    [dataTask resume];

NSString *urlString =@"https://xxxx.co.jp/test";

        @"name": name,

    // é€£æƒ³é…åˆ—ã¨ã—ã¦ä¸ãˆã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã«å¤‰æ›ã™ã‚‹

    NSLog(@"get start");

    [request setURL:[NSURL URLWithString:urlString]];

    [request setValue:@"iOS" forHTTPHeaderField:@"User-Agent"];
    [request setHTTPMethod:@"POST"];
    [request setValue: @"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"  forHTTPHeaderField: @"Content-Type"];
    [request setValue: [NSString stringWithFormat: @"%lu", (unsigned long)[query length]]  forHTTPHeaderField: @"Content-Length"];
    [request setHTTPBody: query];
    
    // å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºãŒå°ã•ã„ã®ã§taskã¯NSURLSessionDataTaskã‚’ä½¿ç”¨

                                CFStringEncoding encoding = CFStringConvertIANACharSetNameToEncoding((CFStringRef) [response textEncodingName]);
                                NSString *body = [[NSString alloc] initWithData:data encoding:CFStringConvertEncodingToNSStringEncoding(encoding)];
                                NSData *restoreData = [[NSData alloc] initWithBase64EncodedString:body options:0];

                                NSString *restoreString = [[NSString alloc] initWithData:restoreData encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
                                dispatch_async(
                                        dispatch_get_main_queue(),
                                        ^{
                                        }

                            }];

    [dataTask resume];

item.description:
ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜

GET

 public String getHistoryData(String key1) {
        HttpURLConnection urlConnection = null;
        InputStream inputStream = null;
        String result = "";
        String str = "";
        try {
            URL url = new URL("https://xxxxx.co.jp/test?key1=" + key1);
            // æ¥ç¶šå…ˆURLã¸ã®ã‚³ãƒã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’é–‹ãï¼ã¾ã æ¥ç¶šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ãªã„
            urlConnection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
            // æ¥ç¶šã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.setConnectTimeout(10000);
            // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®èª­ã¿å–ã‚Šã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.setReadTimeout(10000);
            // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«User-Agentã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.addRequestProperty("User-Agent", "Android");
            // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«Accept-Languageã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.addRequestProperty("Accept-Language", Locale.getDefault().toString());
            // HTTPãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’æŒ‡å®š
            urlConnection.setRequestMethod("GET");
            //ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒœãƒ‡ã‚£ã®é€ä¿¡ã‚’è¨±å¯ã—ãªã„
            urlConnection.setDoOutput(false);
            //ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒœãƒ‡ã‚£ã®å—ä¿¡ã‚’è¨±å¯ã™ã‚‹
            urlConnection.setDoInput(true);
            // é€šä¿¡é–‹å§‹
            urlConnection.connect();
            // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å–å¾—
            int statusCode = urlConnection.getResponseCode();
            // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰200ã¯é€šä¿¡ã«æˆåŠŸã—ãŸã“ã¨ã‚’è¡¨ã™
            if (statusCode == 200) {
                inputStream = urlConnection.getInputStream();
                BufferedReader bufferedReader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(inputStream, "utf-8"));
                // 1è¡Œãšã¤ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹çµæœã‚’å–å¾—ã—strã«è¿½è¨˜
                result = bufferedReader.readLine();
                while (result != null) {
                    str += result;
                    result = bufferedReader.readLine();
                }
                bufferedReader.close();
            }
        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹çµæœã®JSONã‚’Stringå‹ã§è¿”ã™
        return str;
    }

POST

public String PostUserName(String key1, String key2) {
        HttpURLConnection urlConnection = null;
        InputStream inputStream = null;
        String result = "";
        String str = "";

        try {
            URL url = new URL("http://hpph;e.cp.jp"");
            // æ¥ç¶šå…ˆURLã¸ã®ã‚³ãƒã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’é–‹ãï¼ã¾ã æ¥ç¶šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ãªã„
            urlConnection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
            // æ¥ç¶šã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.setConnectTimeout(10000);
            // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®èª­ã¿å–ã‚Šã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.setReadTimeout(10000);
            // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«User-Agentã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.addRequestProperty("User-Agent", "Android");
            // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«Accept-Languageã‚’è¨­å®š
            urlConnection.addRequestProperty("Accept-Language", Locale.getDefault().toString());
            //ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«Content-Typeã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹
            urlConnection.addRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
            // HTTPãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’æŒ‡å®š
            urlConnection.setRequestMethod("POST");

            urlConnection.setUseCaches(false);
            //ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒœãƒ‡ã‚£ã®é€ä¿¡ã‚’è¨±å¯ã—ãªã„
            urlConnection.setDoOutput(true);
            //ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒœãƒ‡ã‚£ã®å—ä¿¡ã‚’è¨±å¯ã™ã‚‹
            urlConnection.setDoInput(true);
            // é€šä¿¡é–‹å§‹
            urlConnection.connect();


            //ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—5:ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒœãƒ‡ã‚£ã®æ›¸ãå‡ºã—ã‚’è¡Œã†ã€‚
            OutputStream outputStream = urlConnection.getOutputStream();
            Map<String, String> keyValues = new HashMap<>();

            keyValues.put("key1", key1);
            keyValues.put("key2", key2);


            if (keyValues.size() > 0) {
                Uri.Builder builder = new Uri.Builder();
                //HashMapã‚’[key=value]å½¢å¼ã®æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã«å¤‰æ›ã™ã‚‹
                for (String key : keyValues.keySet()) {
                    //[key=value]å½¢å¼ã®æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã«å¤‰æ›ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
                    builder.appendQueryParameter(key, keyValues.get(key));
                }
                //[key=value&key=valueâ€¦]å½¢å¼ã®æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã«å¤‰æ›ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
                String join = builder.build().getEncodedQuery();
                PrintStream ps = new PrintStream(outputStream);
                ps.print(join);
                ps.close();
            }
            outputStream.close();

            // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å–å¾—
            int statusCode = urlConnection.getResponseCode();
            // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰200ã¯é€šä¿¡ã«æˆåŠŸã—ãŸã“ã¨ã‚’è¡¨ã™
            if (statusCode == 200) {
                inputStream = urlConnection.getInputStream();
                BufferedReader bufferedReader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
                // 1è¡Œãšã¤ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹çµæœã‚’å–å¾—ã—strã«è¿½è¨˜
                result = bufferedReader.readLine();
                while (result != null) {
                    str += result;
                    result = bufferedReader.readLine();
                }
                bufferedReader.close();
            }
        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        // ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹çµæœã®JSONã‚’Stringå‹ã§è¿”ã™
        return str;
    }
